name: Lightless (itch) (KiraKun)
description:
WARNING: Contains jumpscare.

A game planned to be infinite but because it is my first attempts in unity and game developments - i've made few mistakes which produced a large amount of bugs/bad choices in project structure and game design - this is not true.

In result we have a simple 2d game with only one mechanic - torch lightning/darken.

It's be fun to made it for a and maybe our small team try our best in other Jams.
